casebody.data:
STATE
v.
HART 2018-1384 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 23, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellee's motion for court-appointed counsel and permission to withdraw as counsel. Motion granted. The Ohio Public Defender's Office is appointed to represent appellee, and appellee shall file a memorandum in response to jurisdiction and an affidavit of indigence within 30 days.
